our team

Orlando Brazilian Lymphatic Drainage specializes in Lymphatic Drainage Treatments using the most recent Brazilian Manual Drainage Methods.

We’d like to offer unique moments of quiet and wellness. We provide high quality services for our clients that range from pre/post op lymphatic drainage and body contouring.

All our staff have been professionally trained and certified in body contouring. They also went through extensive peer to peer shadowing and have been trained to become advisors in pre/post op. care, body cotouring and much more.

Laura Ellerbe,
Founder MA 68679
MA 68679

Laura taught business electives for Orange
County Public Schools before taking the leap
of faith and changing careers. She’s been a
licensed massage therapist since 2012, and
first studied
Lymphatic drainage in 2016 at the Academy
of Lymphatic Studies (ACOLS), and later
learned Brazilian Lymphatic Drainage by
Josie Rushing.

She’s used lymphatic drainage to help breast
cancer survivors manage their lymphedema,
women recover from plastic surgery, and
women detox and contour their bodies.

When she’s not seeing clients, she enjoys travel, music and art.

andrea schweich,
Licensed Massage
Therapist MA 97292
MA 97292

Andrea was born in Brazil and has been involved in wellness and beauty her whole life. She is licensed massage therapist whose interest in wellness started when she spent several years in Japan learning about Oriental medicine. She’s been licensed as a massage therapist in Florida since 2019 and is also a licensed esthetician since 2021. She’s experienced in many massage modalities, and specializes in Brazilian Lymphatic Drainage for both health and esthetics. Her goal is to help people look and feel their best.

She is fluent in both Spanish and Portuguese.

Clara Cook,
Licensed Massage
Therapist MA 97292
MA 97292

Clara was born in El Salvador and moved to the US in 2006. She lived in Charlotte, NC for 15 years and relocated to Florida a year ago. She has been a licensed massage therapist for 5 years, and studied with Claire Marie Miller to become certified in lymphatic drainage in 2018.

Clara enjoys helping women look and feel their best, especially after procedures such as lipo, BBLs, and tummy tucks. She’s passionate about women’s health, and specializes in lymphatic drainage during and after pregnancy. She is now working on her certification to become a massage doula.

She likes to travel with family and walking at the beach is her favorite
thing to do. She is a Christian singer and spends a lot of time with her
friends and family.

LOOK GOOD. FEEL BETTER.

We take pride in our superior customer experience. Our main goal is to provide the highest level of comfort to all clients during their visit and, of course, exceptional results.
Book An Appointment Today!

our values

RESPECT
Every person that enters our studio will be treated with respect, kindness, and care. We greet each and every person with eye contact and with confidence and compassion.
EDUCATION
Our role is to not only achieve positive results, but also empower each of our clients with knowledge about their bodies and what they can do to enhance their own well-being.
RESULTS
We are motivated to achieve extraordinary, measurable results for our clients, ourselves, and each other. We readily acknowledge those results no matter how incremental.
CLIENT FOCUSED
Our goal is to create long-term therapeutic relationships with clients as a part of their choice to live healthier lives.
LISTENING
Health issues and concerns are common, but everyone has unique symptoms that cause them distress or concern.
READ MORE
